definition: a diacritical mark used to indicate stress or placed above a vowel to indicate a special pronunciation, to put stress on
details:
noun
- a diacritical mark used to indicate stress or placed above a vowel to indicate a special pronunciation
= synonyms: accent mark
- the relative prominence of a syllable or musical note (especially with regard to stress or pitch)
= synonyms: emphasis
- distinctive manner of oral expression
= example: distinctive manner of oral expression
= synonyms: speech pattern
- the usage or vocabulary that is characteristic of a specific group of people
= synonyms: idiom
- special importance or significance
= synonyms: emphasis
verb
- to put stress on
= example: to put stress on
= synonyms: stress, accentuate
- to stress, single out as important
= example: to stress, single out as important
= synonyms: stress, punctuate, accentuate, emphasize, emphasise
